p: The viral titer (tissue culture infection dose 50, TCID 50) of the Virapur RV1b stock was measured by limiting dilution plating on HeLa Ohio cells (Health Protection Agency, #84121901), and determining the cytopathic effect as previously described [ 12]. The TCID 50 value of the stock was 1.05 × 10 7 IU/mL (infectious units per mL).
